statements: SELECT * FROM player_statistics WHERE player_name = 'Alice';
SELECT player_name, win_count FROM player_statistics WHERE win_count > 10;
SELECT player_id, player_name, kill_count FROM player_statistics WHERE kill_count < 5;
SELECT player_name FROM player_statistics WHERE loss_count = 0;

SELECT * FROM player_statistics WHERE player_id = 1;

SELECT player_name, kill_count FROM player_statistics WHERE kill_count < 5 ORDER BY player_name DESC;
SELECT player_id, win_count, loss_count FROM player_statistics WHERE win_count > loss_count;
SELECT player_id, player_name, win_count, loss_count, kill_count FROM player_statistics WHERE win_count > 5 AND loss_count < 3 ORDER BY win_count DESC, kill_count ASC;

SELECT player_id, win_count, loss_count, kill_count FROM player_stats WHERE loss_count > 10 ORDER BY kill_count DESC;

SELECT player_id, win_count, loss_count, kill_count FROM player_stats WHERE win_count > 10;
SELECT player_id, win_count, loss_count, kill_count FROM player_stats WHERE win_count > loss_count;
SELECT player_id, win_count, loss_count, kill_count FROM player_stats ORDER BY win_count DESC, loss_count ASC;

SELECT player_id, kill_count FROM player_kills WHERE kill_count >= 5 ORDER BY player_id ASC;

SELECT * FROM matches WHERE match_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';

SELECT player_name, win_count, loss_count FROM players WHERE win_count > 10 ORDER BY player_name DESC

SELECT player_id, opponent_id, kill_timestamp FROM kills WHERE player_id = 'abc-123' ORDER BY kill_timestamp DESC
SELECT team_name, player_name, win_loss_ratio FROM teams JOIN players ON teams.team_id = players.player_id ORDER BY win_loss_ratio DESC
SELECT player_id, total_kills FROM player_stats WHERE total_kills > 50 ORDER BY total_kills DESC
